name: Selene Ross
bio_html: is an audio producer, musician and artist. Her stories have been on Radiotopia's The Kitchen Sisters, KALW, NPR, KCRW and independent podcasts. Inspired by creative and innovative mediums for storytelling, she has curated and developed stories and exhibitions for virtual reality, spoken word , and performance art. Selene is based out of her hometown of Berkeley, CA, but lived previously in Berlin, Germany, where she organized and performed at poetry and performance art exhibitions and edited Berlinâ€™s spoken word magazine. She has a B.A. in Environmental Studies and Sociology from the University of California, Santa Barbara.
